item.title: If By Rudyard Kipling
item.description: I read this as a teen and never felt so inspired. I still keep reading to keep myself inspired. If you can keep your head when all about you Are losing theirs and blaming it on you; If you can trust yourself when all men doubt you, But make allowance for their doubting too; If you can wait and not be tired by waiting, Or being lied about, donâ€™t deal in lies,
